name: pipeline construction, liquid manure | pipeline, liquid manure | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3464/documentation

This dataset corresponds to the production and installation of 1 km pipework made of steel coated by plastic (polyethylene and polyurethane) for belowground liquid manure transportation. 

From reception of the raw materials at the factory gate


This infrastructure process includes the production of the pipes, the transport of the different parts  from the factory to the place of installation, the excavation for the installation, and the decommissioning of the pipeline service. Infrastructure of the factory is not included. No land use was included, as those pipelines are mainly situated in industrial or agricultural areas and direct land use is of importance only during the construction process. Lifespan of the pipelines is 30 years.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Agriculture & Animal Husbandry

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The pipeworks for liquid manure were modeled, consisting of 20% DN200 and 80% DN100 steel pipelines coated by plastic (polyethylene and polyurethane). Data for construction were based on Frischknecht et al. (1996): Ökoinventare von Energiesystemen: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Energiesystemen und den Einbezug von Energiesystemen in Ökobilanzen für die Schweiz.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The pipeworks for liquid manure were modeled, consisting of 20% DN200 and 80% DN100 steel pipelines coated by plastic (polyethylene and polyurethane). Data for construction were based on Frischknecht et al (1996): Ökoinventare von Energiesystemen: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Energiesystemen und den Einbezug von Energiesystemen in Ökobilanzen für die Schweiz.
